name: Varenje: Don't Speak with Berries
description:
Varenje: Don't Speak with Berries is a casual adventure game developed by Play Cute. It was originally released in 2018. It was published by JoyBits. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Varenje: Don't Speak with Berries is available on Linux, PC and macOS. You can purchase the game on Steam.
